DOC.brief_title: The Diagnostic Accuracy `` Three Rings Vulvoscopy '' Detection Vulvar Dermatosis
DOC.detailed_description: In order ensure accurate systematic mapping vulvar lesion , previously describe original technique perform colposcopy vulva call `` Three Rings Vulvoscopy '' , take account three different skin type zone , well morphological evaluation lesion accord specificity ( non-specific specific lesion ) . As new colposcopy technique seem promising differential diagnosis vulvar discomfort , design two index test , semi-quantitative test call `` N-S-P scheme '' quantitative test name `` Vulvoscopy Index '' . The sensitivity specificity index test estimate comparison histopathology reference test two group asymptomatic patient ( `` normal vulva '' - without colposcopy lesion `` impaired vulvar skin '' - non-specific lesion ) two group symptomatic patient ( `` vulvodynia '' `` vulvar dermatosis '' ) end study . Vulvar discomfort lesion assess measure `` ISSVD Vulvodynia Pattern Questionnaire '' `` TRIV Form Data '' . Asymptomatic patient recruit asymptomatic patient undergo plan labiaplasty , grant vulvar sample investigation . Biopsy vulva symptomatic patient do routine clinical care .
DOC.criteria: `` Three Rings Vulvoscopy '' perform Poliklinika Harni , period December 2011 December 2016 . Ability provide Informed Consent complete Questionnaire . Incomplete medical record . Lack histopathology . Vulvovaginal infection . Benign tumor vulva . Pre/malignant condition vulva .
